name: tvguide.com - minimalist listings
description:
See the screenshot. Use it at http://www.tvguide.com/Listings/Default.aspx

18 May 2011 - Minor update.

02 April 2011 - Removed popup box.

05 September 2010 - Removed "meebo" bar.


15 July 2010 - Added grid lines to the time bar. (I finally figured out how to get them to line up properly.)

16 December 2010 - Fixes a problem with the url.  If you weren't experiencing problems you don't need to update.
obsoletion_message:
Completely broken.

I don't use this site any more so I don't know if or when I'll ever get around to fixing it.
